title: Engineering the Intelligent Future
subtitle: Zoon.ai combines academic-grade AI research with industrial-strength engineering to build deployable, competitive intelligence solutions.
mission: To democratize access to cutting-edge artificial intelligence by building practical, deployable solutions that solve real business problems. We believe AI should be accessible, understandable, and valuable for every organization.
Founded by AI researchers and software engineers from leading tech companies and academic institutions, Zoon.ai bridges the gap between theoretical AI research and practical business applications.

values.title: Innovation with Purpose
values.description: We build AI solutions that deliver tangible business value, not just technical demonstrations.

values.title: Technical Excellence
values.description: Our code is production-ready, scalable, and maintainable from day one.

values.title: Client Partnership
values.description: We work as an extension of your team, understanding your business deeply.

values.title: Ethical AI
values.description: We prioritize transparency, fairness, and security in all our AI implementations.

team.name: Dr. Alex Chen
team.bio: PhD in Machine Learning from Stanford. Former AI researcher at Google Brain.

team.name: Sarah Johnson
team.bio: 15+ years building scalable systems. Former tech lead at Amazon AWS.
